question: Analyze the current IT investment and technology focus areas of major companies in the healthcare industry to understand market trends and opportunities.

subtasks.task: Identify and retrieve all companies operating in the healthcare industry along with their IT budget and revenue metrics.
Gather detailed information on the strategic technology focus areas for the identified healthcare companies to determine their technology priorities and initiatives.
Compile data on technology services and partnerships for the healthcare companies to analyze their vendor relationships and technology adoption.
Aggregate social media presence and engagement data for healthcare companies to gauge their outreach and public sentiment regarding their IT initiatives.
